original: dran pa dang ldan na mu stegs can dang bdud la sogs pas mi 'phrogs pa'o //üîΩde bas na gzhan @88a * //
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan na mu stegs can dang bdud la sogs pas mi 'phrogs pa'o // de bas na gzhan @88a * //
translated: When one is mindful, one is not carried away by non-Buddhists, demons, etc.

original: gyis mi bkri ba rnam par dag pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gyis mi bkri ba rnam par dag pa zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the purity of not being led by others is included in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan ni gzhan du ste /
analyzed: gzhan ni gzhan du ste /
translated: The other is included in the other.

original: snying rje chen po cis bsdus zhes bya ba ni 'dir rgyu gang gis zhes rgyu 'dri ba nyid de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po cis bsdus zhes bya ba ni 'dir rgyu gang gis zhes rgyu 'dri ba nyid de /
translated: By what is great compassion included? Here, the cause is asked about, by what.

original: 'di ni g-yo med pas bsdus te /
analyzed: 'di ni g-yo med pas bsdus te /
translated: This is included in being without deceit.

original: g-yo med pas bskyed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: g-yo med pas bskyed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it is produced by being without deceit.

original: g-yo med pa ni sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis bsdus te /
analyzed: g-yo med pa ni sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis bsdus te /
translated: Being without deceit is included in the mind that is impartial toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la snyoms pa ma yin pa'i sems gang yin pa de g-yo yin par nges so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la snyoms pa ma yin pa'i sems gang yin pa de g-yo yin par nges so //
translated: It is certain that any mind that is not impartial toward all sentient beings is deceitful.

original: snyoms pa'i sems kyi rgyu ni tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snyoms pa'i sems kyi rgyu ni tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cause of impartiality is the conduct that is not different and the conduct that is not divided.

original: de bzhin du gzhan du yang ci'i phyir byung nas 'dri ba der yang rgyu gang las byung zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan du yang ci'i phyir byung nas 'dri ba der yang rgyu gang las byung zhes zer ro //
translated: In the same way, when it is asked why it arises in another place, there it is said that it arises from what cause.

original: de dag ni bshad pa'i tshig dang mi mthun te /
analyzed: de dag ni bshad pa'i tshig dang mi mthun te /
translated: These are not in accord with the words of the explanation.

original: 'di ltar gdams ngag mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig des g-yo med pa bstan nas /üîΩphyis gdams ngag legs par bzung ba 'dus byas la nye bar rtog pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di bshad do //
analyzed: 'di ltar gdams ngag mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig des g-yo med pa bstan nas / phyis gdams ngag legs par bzung ba 'dus byas la nye bar rtog pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di bshad do //
translated: Thus, the words ‚Äúnot forgetting the instructions‚Äù indicate non-deceptiveness.üîΩLater, the words ‚Äúthoroughly taking up the instructions‚Äù indicate the equality of mind toward all sentient beings.

original: 'dir gdams ngag legs par bzung ba nyid 'dus byas la rtog pa'i rgyur bshad na sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems ni g-yo med pa'i rgyu nyid du bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir gdams ngag legs par bzung ba nyid 'dus byas la rtog pa'i rgyur bshad na sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems ni g-yo med pa'i rgyu nyid du bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: Here, if thoroughly taking up the instructions is explained as the cause of investigating conditioned things, then the mind of equality toward all sentient beings is taught as the cause of non-deceptiveness.

original: de lta na ni snying rje chen po byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rgyu ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni snying rje chen po byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rgyu ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, great compassion would not be the root cause of enlightenment.

original: rgyur bsdu ba dang / 'bras bur bsdu ba zhes bya ba la snga ma snga ma ni sems bskyed pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rgyur bsdu ba dang / 'bras bur bsdu ba zhes bya ba la snga ma snga ma ni sems bskyed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The summary of causes and the summary of results. The former is the cause of generating the mind,

original: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu ste /
translated: and the latter is the result.

original: de bas na rgyu dang 'bras bur bsdu ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rgyu dang 'bras bur bsdu ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the collection of causes and effects.

original: sa bcus bsdus pa'i sems bskyed pa rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba de la /
analyzed: sa bcus bsdus pa'i sems bskyed pa rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba de la /
translated: The generation of the resolve included in the ten stages is of four kinds.

original: sems bskyed pa dang po ni sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus so //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa dang po ni sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus so //
translated: The first generation of the resolve is included in the Joyous stage.

original: spyod pa dang 'brel pa ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa drug po rnams su'o //
analyzed: spyod pa dang 'brel pa ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa drug po rnams su'o //
translated: That associated with the career is in the following six stages, the Stainless, etc.

original: phyir mi ldog pa ni mi g-yo ba la sogs par ro //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa ni mi g-yo ba la sogs par ro //
translated: The irreversible is in the Immovable, etc.

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni sa bcu pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni sa bcu pa nyid la'o //
translated: The one obstructed by one birth is in the tenth stage itself.üîΩThe fourth is of twelve kinds.

original: bzhi pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis zhes bya ba ni de la sems bskyed pa dang po ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i rgyur blta'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis zhes bya ba ni de la sems bskyed pa dang po ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i rgyur blta'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therein, the first generation of the resolve is to be seen as the cause of that associated with the career, etc.

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i rgyur blta'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i rgyur blta'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one obstructed by one birth is to be seen as the cause of that associated with the effect.

original: rgyu ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The cause is the accumulation of merit and knowledge.

original: 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: The effect is Buddhahood.

original: 'brel pa ni de las byung bar blta @88b ste ;
analyzed: 'brel pa ni de las byung bar blta @88b ste ;
translated: The connection is to be seen as the cause of that.

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the cause of buddhahood.

original: bzhi pa 'di'i bshad pa ni gong nas gong du rgyu chud mi za ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa 'di'i bshad pa ni gong nas gong du rgyu chud mi za ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The explanation of the fourth is the non-wastage of the cause from the higher to the lower.

original: sems skyes pa phyi ma phyi ma'i rgyu ni snga ma snga ma ste /
analyzed: sems skyes pa phyi ma phyi ma'i rgyu ni snga ma snga ma ste /
translated: The cause of the later and later generation of the mind is the earlier and earlier.

original: de'i rgyur de rtag tu gnas pas rgyu chud mi za ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyur de rtag tu gnas pas rgyu chud mi za ba'o //
translated: Because it always remains as the cause of that, the cause is not wasted.

original: de ni 'di skad du sems dang po bskyed pa dang 'brel pa nyid kyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di skad du sems dang po bskyed pa dang 'brel pa nyid kyi rgyu'o //
translated: This is what is said: The cause of the connection with the first generation of the mind.

original: gzhan gnyis las spyod pa dang 'brel pa phyir log pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'i nus pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gnyis las spyod pa dang 'brel pa phyir log pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'i nus pa ste /
translated: From the other two, the cause of the connection with practice is by not turning away, and so on.

original: de bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The power of the cause is taught as such.

original: de ltar 'bras bu dang mthun pa'i bzhi pa dang pos rgyu'i gnas bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu dang mthun pa'i bzhi pa dang pos rgyu'i gnas bstan to //
translated: Thus, by the first of the four that accord with the result, the state of the cause is taught.

original: lha'i bu gzhan yang dper na sa bon btab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyur 'os pa bzhi pa gnyis pas ni /
analyzed: lha'i bu gzhan yang dper na sa bon btab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyur 'os pa bzhi pa gnyis pas ni /
translated: Moreover, O son of the gods, it is like the case of a seed being planted, etc.

original: 'bras bu yang gnas so zhes de ston to //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang gnas so zhes de ston to //
translated: The second half of the fourth verse shows that the result also endures.

original: btab pa ni bskrun pa ste /
analyzed: btab pa ni bskrun pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúPlanted‚Äù means ‚Äúproduced.‚Äù

original: sems bskyed pa dang po'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dge ba'i sa bon bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa dang po'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dge ba'i sa bon bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all the wholesome dharmas of the first production of the thought of enlightenment are the production of the seed of the wholesome.

original: sa bon gyi tshul du gnas pa sems bskyed pa dang po gang yin pa de las de dang mthun pa'i myu gu mngon par 'grub bo //
analyzed: sa bon gyi tshul du gnas pa sems bskyed pa dang po gang yin pa de las de dang mthun pa'i myu gu mngon par 'grub bo //
translated: The first production of the thought of enlightenment, which endures in the manner of a seed, produces the sprout that is in conformity with it.

original: chos de ni sems bskyed pa gnyis po ste /
analyzed: chos de ni sems bskyed pa gnyis po ste /
translated: That dharma is the second production of the thought of enlightenment,

original: de las bsdus pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu ba las dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi myu gu rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las bsdus pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu ba las dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi myu gu rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because from it the sprouts of all wholesome dharmas arise, from the activity of the wisdom that is accompanied by the formative forces and is directed towards the concentrated state.

original: sems bskyed pa gnyis pa myu gu'i tshul du gnas pa gang yin pa de las de dang mthun pa sems bskyed pa gsum pa sdong bu la sogs pa lta bu'i chos nyid 'byung ste /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa gnyis pa myu gu'i tshul du gnas pa gang yin pa de las de dang mthun pa sems bskyed pa gsum pa sdong bu la sogs pa lta bu'i chos nyid 'byung ste /
translated: From that second generation of the Thought which remains in the manner of a sprout, there arises the third generation of the Thought which is like a trunk, etc.

original: de la mi g-yo ba la sogs pa gsum gyis bsdus pa mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu bas bsgrim mi dgos par sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mi g-yo ba la sogs pa gsum gyis bsdus pa mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu bas bsgrim mi dgos par sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because, in the three stages of Immovable, etc., the Bodhisattva, by the movement of the wisdom which enters without exertion, perfects the Buddha natures without the need of exertion.

original: de bas na sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni sems bskyed pa gsum pa'i 'bras bur gyur te /
analyzed: de bas na sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni sems bskyed pa gsum pa'i 'bras bur gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the fourth generation of the Thought is the fruit of the third generation of the Thought.

original: 'bras bu yongs su smin pa'i chos yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu yongs su smin pa'i chos yin no //
translated: It is the fruit of the fully ripened nature.

original: de las yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas su grub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas su grub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: From it, the fruit which is the accomplishment of Buddhahood, the perfection of all good qualities, is accomplished.

original: bzhi pa gnyis pa 'di'i bshad pa ni rgyu'i rim gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa gnyis pa 'di'i bshad pa ni rgyu'i rim gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The explanation of this second of the four is the verse beginning with ‚ÄúBy the order of cause, etc.‚Äù

original: rim pa gang gis rgyur gnas pa de nyid kyis 'bras bu ma tshang ba med par 'grub pa yongs su dag go //üîΩdper na shing rta mkhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa gang gis rgyur gnas pa de nyid kyis 'bras bu ma tshang ba med par 'grub pa yongs su dag go // dper na shing rta mkhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa gsum pa'o //
translated: By whatever stages the cause is present, by just those stages the result is accomplished without deficiency.

original: shing bsdu @89a * //
analyzed: shing bsdu @89a * //
translated: For example, the one called ‚Äúchariot-maker‚Äù and so on is the fourth and third.

original: ba zhes bya ba ni shing ji ltar gyur pa ji snyed kyis shing rta 'grub pa de lta bur gyur pa de snyed shes te bsdu ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: ba zhes bya ba ni shing ji ltar gyur pa ji snyed kyis shing rta 'grub pa de lta bur gyur pa de snyed shes te bsdu ba shes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGathering the wood‚Äù means knowing just how much wood is needed to make a chariot, and gathering just that much.

original: de bzhin du sems bskyed pa dang po zhes bya ba ni sa dang po la smon lam chen po bcu po dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsdu ba shes pa'o //üîΩde bas na yang smon lam la brten te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems bskyed pa dang po zhes bya ba ni sa dang po la smon lam chen po bcu po dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsdu ba shes pa'o // de bas na yang smon lam la brten te /
translated: Similarly, the first production of the thought is the first stage, and the ten great vows are the gathering of all the Buddha qualities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúbased on the vows, all the Buddha qualities are gathered.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du spyod pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa la sogs pas drug po drug ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i chos bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang ; shes rab dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du spyod pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa la sogs pas drug po drug ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i chos bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang ; shes rab dang /
translated: Similarly, ‚Äúrelated to practice‚Äù is the six of stainlessness and so on, which are the six branches of buddhahood, because they are the training in the aspects of patience, effort, concentration, wisdom,

original: thabs rnams rim bzhin du sbyong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs rnams rim bzhin du sbyong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and method, respectively.

original: de'i bshad pa ni tshul khrims dang sdom pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni tshul khrims dang sdom pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Its explanation is ‚Äúpure ethics and vows.‚Äù

original: tshul khrims ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ni /
translated: Ethics is

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the perfection of ethics.

original: 'dis mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sems bzlog pas sdom pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sems bzlog pas sdom pa'o //
translated: Since it turns back the mind that is discordant with that, it is a vow.

original: dper na shing rta'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i bshad pa ni bsgom pa'i lam na shes rab dang thabs kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na shing rta'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i bshad pa ni bsgom pa'i lam na shes rab dang thabs kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúthe parts of a chariot‚Äù and so on is the explanation of this, which is the application to all phenomena of wisdom and method on the path of meditation.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa ni bsgom pa'i lam na shes rab dang thabs de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu'i chos bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid thams cad yan lag dang / yan lag can gyi dngos por phan tshun sbyor ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa ni bsgom pa'i lam na shes rab dang thabs de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu'i chos bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid thams cad yan lag dang / yan lag can gyi dngos por phan tshun sbyor ba'i phyir te /
translated: The engagement without manifest activity is on the path of cultivation. By means of both wisdom and method, all the causes of buddhahood, the accumulations of merit and wisdom, are mutually combined as the branches and the whole.

original: 'di ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pa'i ye shes mya ngan las 'das pa 'bras bu yang 'khor ba dang mi mthun pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pa'i ye shes mya ngan las 'das pa 'bras bu yang 'khor ba dang mi mthun pa ste /
translated: Thus, the accumulation of wisdom, included in the accumulation of merit, is nirvana, which is not the result of samsara.

original: ye shes kyi grogs bsod nams kyi tshogs 'byung ba mngon par 'grub par 'bad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mi mthun pa med de /
analyzed: ye shes kyi grogs bsod nams kyi tshogs 'byung ba mngon par 'grub par 'bad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mi mthun pa med de /
translated: The accumulation of merit, the companion of wisdom, is the origin of manifestation, which is not the result of nirvana.

original: de ltar 'di gnyis yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de ltar 'di gnyis yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'grub bo //
translated: Thus, since these two are the branches and the whole, the result is the establishment of nonabiding nirvana.

original: dper na khal dgal ba zhes bya ba ni shing rta yongs su grub nas rdzas la sogs pa khal dgal ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: dper na khal dgal ba zhes bya ba ni shing rta yongs su grub nas rdzas la sogs pa khal dgal ba shes pa'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúlike a fully-laden pack animal‚Äù means that, after the cart is fully-laden with goods, etc., the pack animal is fully-laden.

original: de bzhin du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa des bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi khur shin tu sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa des bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi khur shin tu sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Similarly, ‚Äúthe generation of the resolve obstructed only by a single birth‚Äù means that, by perfecting the stores, one is fully-laden with the burden of accomplishing the aims of self and other.

original: de'i bshad pa ni khur blangs pa mi 'dor ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni khur blangs pa mi 'dor ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of this is ‚Äúnot casting off the burden that has been taken up.‚Äù

original: @89b khur blangs pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: @89b khur blangs pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par sgrub pa'o //
translated: Taking up the burden means accomplishing the aims of self and other.

original: dper na zla ba tshes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zla ba tshes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúlike the waxing moon‚Äù and so on is the fourth.

original: de'i bshad pa ni gong nas gong du mthu rnam par dag par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni gong nas gong du mthu rnam par dag par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of this is ‚Äúthe purification of power in ever higher and higher stages.‚Äù

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gong nas gong du snang ba'i bye brag gi mthu rnam par dag go //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gong nas gong du snang ba'i bye brag gi mthu rnam par dag go //
translated: The orb of the moon is purified in ever higher and higher stages of power, by the particularities of its illumination.

original: sems kyi ni nus pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: sems kyi ni nus pa'i bye brag go //
translated: The mind is purified in ever higher and higher stages of power, by the particularities of its ability.

original: tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba'i dpes ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa cung zad cig gis yongs su ma rdzogs par bstan to //
analyzed: tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba'i dpes ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa cung zad cig gis yongs su ma rdzogs par bstan to //
translated: The example of the moon's orb rising on the night of the fourteenth illustrates the slight generation of the Thought which is obstructed by one birth, and which is not completely fulfilled.

original: tshes bco lnga'i nub mo'i dpes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par bstan to //
analyzed: tshes bco lnga'i nub mo'i dpes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par bstan to //
translated: The example of the night of the fifteenth illustrates the omniscience of the Tathagata which is completely fulfilled in every way.

original: nyan thos rnams kyis ni gang zag la bdag med pa tsam gyis mthong ba'i lam la bden pa khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos rnams kyis ni gang zag la bdag med pa tsam gyis mthong ba'i lam la bden pa khong du chud pa'o //
translated: The disciples have the understanding of the truth on the path of vision by means of the mere selflessness of the person.

original: de las shin tu 'das pa ni sa dang po la mthong ba'i lam na chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid chos kyi dbyings thams cad du song ba'i rnam par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las shin tu 'das pa ni sa dang po la mthong ba'i lam na chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid chos kyi dbyings thams cad du song ba'i rnam par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Far beyond that is the understanding of the sphere of reality which is the identitylessness of all things on the path of vision of the first stage, because it is the understanding of the pervasion of the sphere of reality by the identitylessness of all things.

original: de'i bshad pa ni yang dbang po rno ba'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni yang dbang po rno ba'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni de las shin tu 'das te /
translated: It is the

translated: He accomplishes the infinite conduct for the sake of sentient beings.

original: / sems bskyed pa gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mngon par 'du byed cing 'jug pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: / sems bskyed pa gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mngon par 'du byed cing 'jug pa'i sa'o //
translated: The third generation of the mind of enlightenment, etc. is the stage of engagement through resolute intent.

original: sa bdun pa'i bar du ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: sa bdun pa'i bar du ma nges pa ste /
translated: Up to the seventh stage, it is uncertain,

original: de la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is effort there.

original: rnam par mi rtog par rgyu ba ni nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog par rgyu ba ni nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The eighth stage is certain, because it is the stage of the absence of conceptual thought.

original: de bas na rtsol ba'i rnam par rtog pas skyod par mi nus pa'i phyir sa de mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rtsol ba'i rnam par rtog pas skyod par mi nus pa'i phyir sa de mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, that stage is called immovable, because it cannot be shaken by the conceptual thought of effort.

original: rtsol bar ldog pa med pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa'i sa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsol bar ldog pa med pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa'i sa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The stage of nonretrogression is called the stage of nonretrogression, because there is no turning back from effort.

original: de bas na rtsol ba'i yongs su g-yo ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na rtsol ba'i yongs su g-yo ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained as being beyond all movement of effort.

original: nges pa'i phung po ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
analyzed: nges pa'i phung po ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
translated: The aggregate of certainty is the bodhisattvas who have attained consecration.

original: de bas na rgyal tshab tu rab tu gnas pa de zhes bshad do /
analyzed: de bas na rgyal tshab tu rab tu gnas pa de zhes bshad do /
translated: Therefore, it is explained as the firm establishment as the regent.

original: // /'phags pa ga ya mgo'i ri mdo dang spel mar bshad pa /
analyzed: // /'phags pa ga ya mgo'i ri mdo dang spel mar bshad pa /
translated: Noble G·πõdhrak≈´·π≠a Hill Discourse and Interwoven Explanation,

original: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o //
analyzed: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o //
translated: Part Two, the Final

original: yi ge'i phyi mo 'dzin pa ni 'bru thams cad der 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge'i phyi mo 'dzin pa ni 'bru thams cad der 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the alphabet contains all syllables.

original: tshul zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: tshul zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba ste /
translated: Way means similarity.

original: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa dang po ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu'i chos rnams smon lam chen po bcu po dag gis kun tu bya ba tsam du yi ge'i phyi mo lta bur 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa dang po ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu'i chos rnams smon lam chen po bcu po dag gis kun tu bya ba tsam du yi ge'i phyi mo lta bur 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, the first generation of the mind is like the alphabet, merely holding the causes of buddhahood, the ten great aspirations, in common.

original: de bas na gzhi la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bshad do /
analyzed: de bas na gzhi la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bshad do /
translated: Therefore, it is explained as the basis of superior focus.

original: kun tu bya ba tsam du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa smon lam chen po rnams lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun tu bya ba tsam du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa smon lam chen po rnams lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the ten great aspirations, which are the basis of all buddha qualities, are merely held in common, they are the basis of superior focus.

original: rnam par dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'di'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'di'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: Knowledge of thorough differentiation and thorough differentiation means this is its thorough differentiation.

original: 'di ni legs par rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni legs par rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: This is the thorough differentiation.

original: de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni de la mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu ba dri ma med pa la sogs pas drug gis bsdus pa la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
analyzed: de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni de la mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu ba dri ma med pa la sogs pas drug gis bsdus pa la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
translated: The generation of the thought associated with the career is included in the six perfections, beginning with the stainless functioning of the wisdom that engages with the object with full realization.

original: tshogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the thorough knowledge of the differentiation of the dharmas that have the characteristic of the collections of merit and wisdom.

original: de'i bshad pa ni blos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni blos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The explanation of that is: the thorough differentiation by the mind.

original: bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa sa drug po dag gi blos chos rab tu rnam par 'byed @90b ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa sa drug po dag gi blos chos rab tu rnam par 'byed @90b ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The thorough differentiation of the dharmas by the mind on the six stages included in the path of cultivation.

original: grangs dang rtsis gzhan du don gcig tu zin kyang 'dir so sor smos pa'i phyir rtsis dang tha dad de /
analyzed: grangs dang rtsis gzhan du don gcig tu zin kyang 'dir so sor smos pa'i phyir rtsis dang tha dad de /
translated: Although in other contexts number and calculation have the same meaning, here they are mentioned separately, so they are different.

original: grangs ni gcig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: grangs ni gcig la sogs pa'o //
translated: Number is one, etc.

original: gzhal ba la sogs pas yongs su bcad pa ni rtsis su blta'o //
analyzed: gzhal ba la sogs pas yongs su bcad pa ni rtsis su blta'o //
translated: Calculation is seen as the determination by means of measurement, etc.

original: shod dgod pa ni 'jog pa ste /
analyzed: shod dgod pa ni 'jog pa ste /
translated: Setting is placing.

original: de shes pas 'du ba dang 'god pa thams cad la rtag tu ma rmongs na nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde lta bur ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas bdag dang gzhan mtshungs par khong du chud pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sbyin pa bdag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
analyzed: de shes pas 'du ba dang 'god pa thams cad la rtag tu ma rmongs na nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro // de lta bur ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas bdag dang gzhan mtshungs par khong du chud pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sbyin pa bdag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
translated: If one is never confused about all the ways of gathering and spending because of knowing that, wealth will increase.üîΩThus, the so-called irreversible generation of the mind of enlightenment is the eighth stage, because one attains forbearance regarding the non-arising of all things and thus realizes the sameness of self and others.

original: su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The generosity of others is also one‚Äôs own, because it causes the perfection of generosity to be completed.

original: de ni thabs mkhas pas chos thams cad la 'jal ba zhes bya bas bshad do /
analyzed: de ni thabs mkhas pas chos thams cad la 'jal ba zhes bya bas bshad do /
translated: This is explained by the expression ‚Äúone who is skilled in means evaluates all things.‚Äù

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i bdag dang gzhan mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid thabs mkhas pas gzhan gyi sbyin pa la sogs pa yang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i bdag dang gzhan mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid thabs mkhas pas gzhan gyi sbyin pa la sogs pa yang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that because one is skilled in means, one appropriates the generosity of others, etc., which have the characteristic of sameness of self and others as explained above.

original: de lta bur ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ba ni sa bcu pa la bsgom pa khyad zhugs pas mthar phyin pa'i chos rnams khong du chud pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de lta bur ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ba ni sa bcu pa la bsgom pa khyad zhugs pas mthar phyin pa'i chos rnams khong du chud pa'i phyir te /
translated: Thus, he is called ‚Äúone lifetime away‚Äù because he has penetrated the qualities of culmination by means of his distinctive cultivation on the tenth stage.

original: de ni ye shes khong du chud pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni ye shes khong du chud pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: This is explained as ‚Äúpenetrating pristine wisdom.‚Äù

original: rgyur 'brel pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyur 'brel pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúconnected with the cause‚Äù means

original: rgyu ni len pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: rgyu ni len pa'i rgyu ste /

original: rgyu nyid ni 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu nyid ni 'brel pa ste /
translated: The cause itself is the connection.

analyzed: bdag nyid zag pa med pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi len pa'i dngos por gnas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said that he is the appropriating entity of the uncontaminated dharmas because he himself is uncontaminated.

analyzed: 'di'i bshad pa ni rang bzhin gyis rus phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ste /

translated: The phrase ‚Äúconnected with knowledge‚Äù means ‚Äúconnected with consciousness.‚Äù

original: nges par 'byed pa nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: It is situated in the very process of penetrating insight.

original: de ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: This is explained by the phrase ‚Äúit holds the mundane and supramundane teachings.‚Äù

original: gtong bas spong ba ste /
analyzed: gtong bas spong ba ste /
translated: It is relinquished through abandonment.

original: spros pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: spros pa dang bral ba ste /

analyzed: de'i ngo bo dang 'brel par rnam par gnas pa'o //

analyzed: de ni spros pa las dben pa zhes bya bas bshad do //

original: 'bras bu dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i dngos por gnas pa'o //üîΩ'bras bu ni 'dir lhun gyis grub par sems can gyi don byed pa ste de ni lhun gyis grub @91a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i dngos por gnas pa'o // 'bras bu ni 'dir lhun gyis grub par sems can gyi don byed pa ste de ni lhun gyis grub @91a * //
translated: It is connected with the result. It is situated in the state of being the entity that is the result.

original: par sems can gyi don byed pa zhes bya bas bshad do //üîΩrgyur 'brel pa'i tshig gis ni rgyu nyid du gnas so zhes bya bas don 'di bstan to //
analyzed: par sems can gyi don byed pa zhes bya bas bshad do // rgyur 'brel pa'i tshig gis ni rgyu nyid du gnas so zhes bya bas don 'di bstan to //
translated: The result here is the spontaneous activity that acts on behalf of sentient beings. This is explained by the phrase ‚Äúit acts on behalf of sentient beings spontaneously and effortlessly.‚ÄùüîΩThe phrase ‚Äúit is connected with the cause‚Äù teaches the meaning of ‚Äúit is situated in the state of being the cause.‚Äù

analyzed: rgyus bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni rgyus bsdus shing rgyus bskyed ces bya ba'i don 'di ston te /

original: bye brag ni de yod do //
analyzed: bye brag ni de yod do //
translated: The difference is that it exists.

original: de bas na mos pas spyod pa na mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su smin pas sa dang po la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na mos pas spyod pa na mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su smin pas sa dang po la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained that the bodhisattva who is in the stage of action in faith, by the full maturation of his application, has a superior objective on the first stage.

original: mos pas spyod pa'i sa na mngon par 'du byed pa de yongs su smin pa ni sa rab tu dga' ba la 'jug par gegs med par nus pa nyid de /
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa'i sa na mngon par 'du byed pa de yongs su smin pa ni sa rab tu dga' ba la 'jug par gegs med par nus pa nyid de /
translated: The full maturation of that application in the stage of action in faith is the ability to enter the stage of joy without obstruction.

original: des sa dang po la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des sa dang po la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that, the bodhisattva has a superior objective on the first stage.

original: ye shes kyis bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa gang mthar phyin pa'i ye shes des bsdus pa ste bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyis bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa gang mthar phyin pa'i ye shes des bsdus pa ste bskyed pa'o //
translated: That which is included in the stage of joy is included in the perfected knowledge, i.e., it is generated by that perfected knowledge.

original: khams rnams kyi don ni du ma yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khams rnams kyi don ni du ma yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of the elements is manifold.

original: de ni ye shes yongs su smin pas sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa las lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni ye shes yongs su smin pas sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa las lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: That is explained as having a superior objective by the full maturation of knowledge, in the practice that is born of application.

original: sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'i ye shes yongs su smin pa ni sa gnyis pa bskyed par gegs med par nus pa nyid de /
analyzed: sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'i ye shes yongs su smin pa ni sa gnyis pa bskyed par gegs med par nus pa nyid de /
translated: The full maturation of the knowledge subsumed by the stage of the Joyful One is the ability to generate the second stage without obstruction.

original: rgyu des sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa dri ma med pa la sogs pas bsdus pa la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu des sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa dri ma med pa la sogs pas bsdus pa la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For that reason, it is the special focus on the stainless deeds subsumed by the practice of the perfections.

original: spong bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis spong bas na spong ba ste /
analyzed: spong bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis spong bas na spong ba ste /
translated: Subsumed by abandonment refers to abandonment because it abandons.

original: sa bdun pas bsdus pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: sa bdun pas bsdus pa'i lam ste /
translated: It is the path subsumed by the seventh stage.

original: gang de ma thag tu sa mi g-yo ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gang de ma thag tu sa mi g-yo ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is that which immediately enters the immovable stage and so on.

original: des bsdus pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: des bsdus pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: It is subsumed by that.

original: de ni bsgom pa yongs su smin pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni bsgom pa yongs su smin pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: It is explained that the full maturation of meditation is the special focus on the qualities of buddhahood that have not been obtained.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par 'jug pa'i bsgom pa yongs su smin par mthar phyin pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par 'jug pa'i bsgom pa yongs su smin par mthar phyin pa ste /
translated: It is the full accomplishment of the full maturation of meditation that engages with the formative forces.

original: des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa la sogs pa ma thob pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa la sogs pa ma thob pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the Dharma that is not attained, such as the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas, that is especially observed.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa la sogs pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa la sogs pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: That very acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas, etc. is the fruit of the non-returner for the bodhisattva.

original: yang mngon par 'du byed par 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang mngon par 'du byed par 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no return to manifest activity.

original: 'bras bu de ltar gyur pa nyid kyis bsdus pa ni sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu de ltar gyur pa nyid kyis bsdus pa ni sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth generation of the mind is included by that very fruition.

original: de ni 'bras bu yongs su smin pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu yongs su smin pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: It is explained as the complete realization of perfect enlightenment as desired by the maturation of the fruit.

original: sa mi g-yo ba la sogs @91b pas bsdus pa bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'bras bu yongs su smin pa ste /
analyzed: sa mi g-yo ba la sogs @91b pas bsdus pa bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'bras bu yongs su smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of the fruit by the characteristics just explained, included in the Immovable ground, etc.,

original: rgyu des sa bcu la de'i sgrib pa spangs nas chos kyi dbyings ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu des sa bcu la de'i sgrib pa spangs nas chos kyi dbyings ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is because by that cause, on the ten grounds, having abandoned its obscurations, one completely realizes the dharmadhatu as desired.

original: rgyu las yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu las yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de rgyu las yang dag par byung ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu las yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu las yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de rgyu las yang dag par byung ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from a cause‚Äù means that which arises from a cause is arisen from a cause.

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is synonymous with ‚Äúunerring cause.‚Äù

original: de ni ma nor bar dge ba bsgom pa'i gnas zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni ma nor bar dge ba bsgom pa'i gnas zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: This is explained as ‚Äúthe basis for cultivating unerring virtue.‚Äù

original: mos pas spyod pa'i sas bsdus pas ma nor ba'i dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i gnas sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa'i sas bsdus pas ma nor ba'i dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i gnas sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That generation of the thought which is the basis for cultivating unerring virtue, included in the stage of practice through devoted interest, is called that.

original: bzhi po gong ma nyid kyi rgyus bsdus pa'i tshig gis ni gegs med par nus pa rgyu gang gis bskyed pa de bstan to //
analyzed: bzhi po gong ma nyid kyi rgyus bsdus pa'i tshig gis ni gegs med par nus pa rgyu gang gis bskyed pa de bstan to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúincluded in the cause of the four above‚Äù indicates the cause by which the power of non-obstruction is generated.

original: des ni de'i rgyu phyin ci ma log pa bstan te /
analyzed: des ni de'i rgyu phyin ci ma log pa bstan te /
translated: This shows the unerring cause of that.

original: 'di ni bye brag go //
analyzed: 'di ni bye brag go //
translated: This is the distinction.

original: ye shes las yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba ni sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'i ye shes las yang dag par byung ba phyin ci ma log pa rgyur gyur pa las byung ba sems bskyed pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de ye shes las byung
analyzed: ye shes las yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba ni sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'i ye shes las yang dag par byung ba phyin ci ma log pa rgyur gyur pa las byung ba sems bskyed pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de ye shes las byung
translated: Arisen from wisdom refers to the second generation of the resolve, which arises from the unerring cause that arises from the wisdom subsumed by the stage of the joyous.

original: ba'o // de ni ma nor ba'i chos la nges par rtog pa'i skye gnas zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: ba'o // de ni ma nor ba'i chos la nges par rtog pa'i skye gnas zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: It is called the birthplace of the discernment of the unerring Dharma,

original: ma nor ba'i sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: ma nor ba'i sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'o //
translated: the unerring stage subsumed by the joyous.

original: chos la nges par rtog pa'i skye gnas ni rgyu ste gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: chos la nges par rtog pa'i skye gnas ni rgyu ste gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The cause is the birthplace of the discernment of the Dharma, and that is what is meant.üîΩArisen from elimination refers to the third generation of the resolve, which arises from the unerring cause that arises from the wisdom subsumed by the seventh stage.

original: spong ba las yang dag par byung ba zhes pa 'dis spong bas na spong ba ste /üîΩsa bdun pas bsdus pa'i ye shes de las yang dag par byung ba phyin ci ma log pa sems bskyed pa gsum pa gang yin pa de spong ba las yang dag par byung ba'o//
analyzed: spong ba las yang dag par byung ba zhes pa 'dis spong bas na spong ba ste /üîΩsa bdun pas bsdus pa'i ye shes de las yang dag par byung ba phyin ci ma log pa sems bskyed pa gsum pa gang yin pa de spong ba las yang dag par byung ba'o//
translated: It is called arisen from elimination because it is eliminated.

original: de ni ma nor bar bsgom pa'i gnas zhes bya bas bshad do /
analyzed: de ni ma nor bar bsgom pa'i gnas zhes bya bas bshad do /
translated: That is explained as the stage of unerring meditation.

original: ma nor bar bsgom pas sa bdun pas bsdus pa'i gnas las byung ba sems bskyed pa gsum pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ma nor bar bsgom pas sa bdun pas bsdus pa'i gnas las byung ba sems bskyed pa gsum pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The third generation of the Thought, which is included in the seventh stage, is called that because it arises from the stage of unerring meditation.

original: 'bras bu rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba las yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu las yang dag par byung ba de ni rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: 'bras bu rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba las yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu las yang dag par byung ba de ni rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: That which arises from the fruit, which is mastery over one's own mind, is called mastery over one's own mind.üîΩThe first generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the cause, because it is the cause of the second stage and so on. It is the limb of the dharmas included in the stage of Very Joyful One, which are the divisions of that.üîΩThe second generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the result, because it is the result of the first stage.üîΩThe third generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the cause, because it is the cause of the third stage and so on. It is the limb of the dharmas included in the stage of Stainless One, which are the divisions of that.üîΩThe fourth generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the result, because it is the result of the second stage.

original: sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyu rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis pa la sogs pa'i rgyur gyur pas sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'i chos rnams kyis rab tu dbye ba yang yin pa de dag gi yan lag ste /üîΩsems @92a * //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyu rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis pa la sogs pa'i rgyur gyur pas sa rab tu dga' bas bsdus pa'i chos rnams kyis rab tu dbye ba yang yin pa de dag gi yan lag ste /üîΩsems @92a * //
translated: The fifth generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the cause, because it is the cause of the third stage and so on. It is the limb of the dharmas included in the stage of Luminous One, which are the divisions of that.üîΩThe sixth generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the result, because it is the result of the third stage.üîΩThe seventh generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the cause, because it is the cause of the fourth stage and so on. It is the limb of the dharmas included in the stage of Radiant One, which are the divisions of that.üîΩThe eighth generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the result, because it is the result of the fourth stage.üîΩThe ninth generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the cause, because it is the cause of the fifth stage and so on. It is the limb of the dharmas included in the stage of Very Difficult to Conquer, which are the divisions of that.üîΩThe tenth generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the result, because it is the result of the fifth stage.üîΩThe eleventh generation of the Thought is the limb of the division of the cause, because it is the cause of the sixth stage and so on. It is the

original: bskyed pa dang po de nyid la brten nas byang chub kyi rgyur rnam par gnas pa'i chos rnams rnam pa mang por 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang po de nyid la brten nas byang chub kyi rgyur rnam par gnas pa'i chos rnams rnam pa mang por 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the many aspects of the dharmas that are the causes of enlightenment increase on the basis of that first generation.

original: de ni yang dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa 'dzin pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni yang dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa 'dzin pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: That is explained as the ‚Äúaccumulation of infinite roots of virtue.‚Äù

original: ye shes rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag ces bya ba ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa sa drug po rnams na sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la gnas pa'i ye shes chos sna tshogs la rtogs pas du mar tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag ces bya ba ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa sa drug po rnams na sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la gnas pa'i ye shes chos sna tshogs la rtogs pas du mar tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The branch of the analysis of intuition is on the second stage of the generation of the spirit of enlightenment, on the six stages beginning with the stainless stage, because the intuition of the bodhisattva on those stages is manifoldly differentiated by the realization of the variety of phenomena.

original: de ni chos mtha' yas pa la nges par rtog pa zhes bya bas bshad do //üîΩmngon par 'du byed pa thams cad spong ba thob pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid spong ba'o //
analyzed: de ni chos mtha' yas pa la nges par rtog pa zhes bya bas bshad do // mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad spong ba thob pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid spong ba'o //
translated: That is explained as the ‚Äúrealization of infinite dharmas.‚ÄùüîΩThe branch of the analysis of the concentrations is on the eighth stage, because on that stage one attains the effortless entry into concentration, since all the efforts to eliminate the addictions are abandoned.

original: de dag gi rab tu dbye ba sna tshogs kyi yan lag ste /
analyzed: de dag gi rab tu dbye ba sna tshogs kyi yan lag ste /
translated: The concentrations are the eliminations.

original: sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa thob pa'i phyir de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa thob pa'i phyir de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: On the eighth stage, it is called ‚Äúthe entrance into the infinite doors of concentration‚Äù because of the attainment of infinite concentrations through the power of the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid sgo ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid sgo ste /
translated: The concentrations themselves are the doors,

original: de dang 'brel pa'i don rnams kyi sgor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa'i don rnams kyi sgor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the doors to the meanings that are connected with them.

original: 'bras bu ni ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa mtha' yas pa myong ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa mtha' yas pa myong ba'o //
translated: The result is the experience of infinite play with the concentrations.

original: des rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag ni sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: des rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag ni sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ste /
translated: The branch that is distinguished by that is the fourth production of the thought,

original: sa bcu pa la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgyu ma mtha' yas pa rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bcu pa la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgyu ma mtha' yas pa rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the liberation of infinite magical creations of concentration on the tenth stage.

original: de ni rnam par rol pa mtha' yas pa myong ba zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni rnam par rol pa mtha' yas pa myong ba zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: It is called ‚Äúthe experience of infinite play‚Äù

original: sman bsdu ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni de dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sman bsdu ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni de dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The method of collecting medicine is like that; that is the meaning of ‚Äúsimilarly.‚Äù

original: de'i bshad pa ni yang nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gnyen po'i gnas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni yang nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gnyen po'i gnas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The explanation of that is called ‚Äúthe basis of the medicine for the disease of the afflictions.‚Äù

original: nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gnyen po ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sman no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gnyen po ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sman no //
translated: The medicine for the disease of the afflictions is the medicine of uncontaminated intuition.

original: de'i gnas ni sems bskyed pa dang po ste /
analyzed: de'i gnas ni sems bskyed pa dang po ste /
translated: The basis of that is the first production of the thought,

original: sa rab tu dga' ba la thog mar zag pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa rab tu dga' ba la thog mar zag pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because on the ground of Very Joyous, one first obtains uncontaminated intuition.

original: sman rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nad dang mthun pa'i sman rab tu shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sman rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nad dang mthun pa'i sman rab tu shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the passage beginning ‚Äúthe classification of medicine‚Äù is called ‚Äúknowing the medicine that is appropriate to the disease of the afflictions.‚Äù

original: shes nas kyang mthun pa'i sman ni thabs te snying rje'o //
analyzed: shes nas kyang mthun pa'i sman ni thabs te snying rje'o //
translated: Having known that, the appropriate medicine is the method, which is compassion.

original: des 'khor ba mi gtong ste /
analyzed: des 'khor ba mi gtong ste /
translated: By that, one does not abandon cyclic existence.

original: de ni sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo'i tshig bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo'i tshig bshad pa'o //
translated: That is the explanation of the passage beginning ‚Äúskill in compounding medicine.‚Äù

original: nad gso ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sman rab tu sa bcu pas bsdus pa bar chad med pa'i lam rab kyi mchog gis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa spang ba'i @92b phyir sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni nadüîΩpa gso ba zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: nad gso ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sman rab tu sa bcu pas bsdus pa bar chad med pa'i lam rab kyi mchog gis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa spang ba'i @92b phyir sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni nad pa gso ba zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: The fourth generation of the mind of enlightenment is called ‚Äúthe healer‚Äù because it is the supreme path of no obstacles that is included in the tenth stage, the Cloud of Dharma, and it eliminates the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience together with their propensities.

original: de'i bshad pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nad las gso ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nad las gso ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that is ‚Äúthe healing of the illness of the afflictions.‚Äù

original: chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dpe ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dpe ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: The example of the ‚Äúking of the Dharma‚Äù is the universal monarch.

original: dngos ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so //
analyzed: dngos ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so //
translated: The actuality is the transcendent buddhas.

original: de dag gi rigs ni skye ba'i gnas te byang chub sems dpa' de kho na mthong ba dag go //
analyzed: de dag gi rigs ni skye ba'i gnas te byang chub sems dpa' de kho na mthong ba dag go //
translated: Their family is the place of birth, the bodhisattvas who see reality.

original: de mtshan nyid gcig pa ni rgyud de der 'byung ba'i tshul du sa dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mtshan nyid gcig pa ni rgyud de der 'byung ba'i tshul du sa dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They have the same characteristics because they are a continuum, in the sense of arising in that continuum, on the first stage, where they are born into the family of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: der skyes nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis non te /
analyzed: der skyes nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis non te /
translated: Having been born there, he surpasses the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: This is called the surpassing of all Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: dpe ni rig pa rnams dang sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa'i bslab pa yang dag pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dpe ni rig pa rnams dang sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa'i bslab pa yang dag pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The example is the correct grasping of the training in the skills and arts.

original: dngos po ni dmigs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bla na med pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po ni dmigs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bla na med pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The substance is the unsurpassed morality of the vow which is endowed with the absence of conceptualization.

original: 'di'i bshad pa ni de yang bslab pa'i gnas thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i bshad pa ni de yang bslab pa'i gnas thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The explanation of this is that it is also called the surpassing of all the bases of training.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa zil gyis non pa ste /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa zil gyis non pa ste /
translated: Also means the surpassing of the Sravakas, etc.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i bslab pa'i rnam pa dag las khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i bslab pa'i rnam pa dag las khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that it is called the surpassing of the aspects of the training of the Sravakas, etc.

original: bslab pa tshar phyin pa ni khams gsum pa la bslab pa rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: bslab pa tshar phyin pa ni khams gsum pa la bslab pa rdzogs pa ste /
translated: The completion of the training is the completion of the training in the three realms.

original: sa brgyad pa la mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas 'jug pa'i bslab pa rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa la mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas 'jug pa'i bslab pa rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because on the eighth stage, the training in the practice is perfected through the absence of formative influence.

original: de'i bshad pa ni sgom pa khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni sgom pa khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that is the superiority of meditative realization.

original: sgom pa khyad par du 'phags pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par dge ba thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgom pa khyad par du 'phags pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par dge ba thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The superiority of meditative realization is due to the absence of formative influence in the practice of all that is virtuous.

original: sems can gyi don du lhun gyis grub par bslab pa rnams la 'jug pa la dbang sgyur te /
analyzed: sems can gyi don du lhun gyis grub par bslab pa rnams la 'jug pa la dbang sgyur te /
translated: He is powerful in the practice of the trainings for the benefit of sentient beings through spontaneity.

original: de ni bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is called the superiority of the result of meditative realization.

original: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni sems can gyi don no //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni sems can gyi don no //
translated: The result of meditative realization is the benefit of sentient beings.

original: de'i khyad par du 'phags pa ni lhun gyis grub par thams cad du cig car yang dag par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i khyad par du 'phags pa ni lhun gyis grub par thams cad du cig car yang dag par sgrub pa'o //
translated: Its superiority is due to the accomplishment of everything simultaneously and spontaneously.

original: chos kyi mnga' bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: chos kyi mnga' bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Lord of the Dharma is the Lord Buddha.

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la yongs su dris pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni dang por zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'od zer gyi 'od kyis dris pa gang yin pa dang / bar du 'od rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer @93a * //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la yongs su dris pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni dang por zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'od zer gyi 'od kyis dris pa gang yin pa dang / bar du 'od rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer @93a * //
translated: The question asked of noble Manjushri refers to the question asked by the light of the stainless radiance of the moon in the beginning and the question asked by the light of the ray of ascertaining light in the middle.

original: gyi 'od dang / 'og tu ye shes sgrub pa dpa' bos dris pa gang yin pa de thams cad bsdus te brgal ba'o //
analyzed: gyi 'od dang / 'og tu ye shes sgrub pa dpa' bos dris pa gang yin pa de thams cad bsdus te brgal ba'o //
translated: The question asked of noble Manjusri means that the question asked by the light of the stainless splendor of the moon at the beginning, the question asked by the light of the ray of the ascertainment of light in the middle, and the question asked by the hero who accomplishes wisdom below are all included and refuted.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mnga' bdag bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang zab mo dris pa rnams la lan 'debs pa'o zhes de dag la lan 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mnga' bdag bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang zab mo dris pa rnams la lan 'debs pa'o zhes de dag la lan 'debs pa'o //
translated: In order to generate faith in the bodhisattvas means that just as the lord of the Dharma answers the profound questions, so too the bodhisattvas answer them.

original: de ltar re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi mthu de brgyad pa'i don bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi mthu de brgyad pa'i don bshad do //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the eighth stage is explained in that way.

original: da ni spyod pa rnam par dbye ba bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni spyod pa rnam par dbye ba bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the analysis of conduct should be explained.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis su bshad do /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis su bshad do /
translated: And that is explained in two parts.

original: rgyus bsdus pa dang / 'bras bus bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas rgyus bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: rgyus bsdus pa dang / 'bras bus bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas rgyus bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The cause is summarized in the first verse, and the result is summarized in the second verse.

original: tshogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni tshogs kyi lam bstan pa dang rnam par rig pa'i lam bstan pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni tshogs kyi lam bstan pa dang rnam par rig pa'i lam bstan pa'o //
translated: The path of accumulation and the path of preparation are taught by the verse beginning with ‚Äúaccumulation.‚Äù

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' bstan pa dang ; yang dag pa'i mtha' de khong du chud par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' bstan pa dang ; yang dag pa'i mtha' de khong du chud par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The limit of reality is taught by the verse beginning with ‚Äúthe limit of reality,‚Äù and the method for realizing that limit of reality is taught.

original: de yang mdo las /
analyzed: de yang mdo las /
translated: Moreover, in the sutra it is said:

original: thabs dang shes rab bo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bo zhes bya ba la /
translated: ‚ÄúSkillful means and wisdom.‚Äù

original: de la thabs ni tshogs kyi lam mo //
analyzed: de la thabs ni tshogs kyi lam mo //
translated: Therein, skillful means is the path of accumulation.

original: shes rab ni rnam par dag pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: shes rab ni rnam par dag pa'i lam mo //
translated: Wisdom is the path of purification.

original: 'di gnyis ni mdo'i tshig thabs ni bsdu ba shes pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcu drug gis bshad do //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ni mdo'i tshig thabs ni bsdu ba shes pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcu drug gis bshad do //
translated: These two are explained by the sutra passage beginning with ‚Äúskillful means is the knowledge of compilation,‚Äù and so on.

original: de la brgyad pa phyed phyed bkod pas ni thabs bstan to /
analyzed: de la brgyad pa phyed phyed bkod pas ni thabs bstan to /
translated: The first half of the eighth verse shows the means.

original: de bas na tshogs kyi lam bstan pa ni rnam pa brgyad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de bas na tshogs kyi lam bstan pa ni rnam pa brgyad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Therefore, the path of accumulation is shown by eight aspects.

original: shes rab kyang brgyad po de nyid kyi tshogs phyed phyed bkod pas bstan to //
analyzed: shes rab kyang brgyad po de nyid kyi tshogs phyed phyed bkod pas bstan to //
translated: Wisdom is also shown by the first half of the eighth verse.

original: de bas na 'og nas rnam par dag pa'i lam bstan pa yang rnam pa brgyad kyis zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de bas na 'og nas rnam par dag pa'i lam bstan pa yang rnam pa brgyad kyis zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, the path of purification is also stated below by eight aspects.

original: sems can rnam pa tha dad pa ni kha cig ni brkam chags can te //
analyzed: sems can rnam pa tha dad pa ni kha cig ni brkam chags can te //
translated: Sentient beings are of different types. Some are greedy.

original: de dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par bya'o //
translated: They should be ripened by generosity.

original: zhe sdang can dag ni snyan par smra bas so //
analyzed: zhe sdang can dag ni snyan par smra bas so //
translated: Those with hatred by speaking pleasantly.

original: nga rgyal can dag ni don dpyod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas so//
analyzed: nga rgyal can dag ni don dpyod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas so//
translated: Those with pride by investigating the meaning and so on.

original: de la thabs ni bsdu ba shes pa'o zhes mdo'i tshig 'di'i bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de la thabs ni bsdu ba shes pa'o zhes mdo'i tshig 'di'i bshad pa ste /
translated: Here, the means is knowing how to gather. This is the explanation of the words of the sutra.

original: brkam chags can la sogs pa dag sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsdu bas yongs su smin par bya ba shes nas de bzhin du spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brkam chags can la sogs pa dag sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsdu bas yongs su smin par bya ba shes nas de bzhin du spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Knowing that those who are greedy, etc. are to be matured by the means of gathering through generosity, etc., he practices accordingly.

original: sems can la lta ba zhes bya ba ni de dag gis nyes par spyad kyang de dag mi gtong ba'i phyir @93b ro ;
analyzed: sems can la lta ba zhes bya ba ni de dag gis nyes par spyad kyang de dag mi gtong ba'i phyir @93b ro ;
translated: The regard for sentient beings is because he does not abandon them even though they misbehave.

original: / de ni de dag gi nyes par spyod pa sna tshogs kyis ji mi snyam pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: / de ni de dag gi nyes par spyod pa sna tshogs kyis ji mi snyam pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: That is explained by he is indifferent to their various misbehaviors.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni sems can rnams so //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni sems can rnams so //
translated: The them refers to sentient beings.

original: chos ni lha dang mi'i 'gro bas bsdus pa dag go //
analyzed: chos ni lha dang mi'i 'gro bas bsdus pa dag go //
translated: The Dharma refers to those included in the destinies of gods and humans.

original: sbyor ba ni dge ba'i mngon par 'du byas pa gang gis chos de la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni dge ba'i mngon par 'du byas pa gang gis chos de la sbyor ba'o //
translated: The application refers to the virtuous compositional activity by which one applies oneself to that Dharma.

original: des shes pa ni des 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: des shes pa ni des 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
translated: The knowledge refers to not abandoning cyclic existence by that.

original: de ni dkar po'i chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par byed pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni dkar po'i chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par byed pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: That is explained by it is the collector of all virtuous qualities.

original: mngon par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid dkar po'i chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par byed pa ni mi zad par yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid dkar po'i chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par byed pa ni mi zad par yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of the higher realms is the complete collection of all virtuous qualities, which is the cause of the attainment of the higher realms.

original: rgyu ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so //
translated: The cause is the factors of enlightenment.

original: de dag la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pas dmigs pa ni rgyu la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pas dmigs pa ni rgyu la dmigs pa'o //
translated: The object of observation of the cause is the observation of the factors of enlightenment.

original: de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: That is explained as the special observation of the factors of enlightenment.

original: chos ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rnams te /
analyzed: chos ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rnams te /
translated: The phenomena are the dependent characteristics.

original: ji ltar snang ba bzhin du sems can tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa ni chos tha dad pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba bzhin du sems can tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa ni chos tha dad pa shes pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of the different phenomena is the establishment of sentient beings as different, just as they appear.

original: gang gis sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje rab tu 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje rab tu 'byung ba'o //
translated: That is the compassion which focuses on sentient beings.

original: de'i bshad pa ni mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The explanation of that is the different characteristics.

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi dngos po'i sems can so so'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi dngos po'i sems can so so'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for the establishment of the individual characteristics of the sentient beings who are subject to the other-dependent.

original: smon lam gyi khyad par gyis bsdus pa bsod nams kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan te de shes pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam gyi khyad par gyis bsdus pa bsod nams kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan te de shes pa'o //
translated: The ornament of the Buddha-field is the knowledge of the ornament of the Buddha-field by means of the special merit which is included in the special vow and by means of which one adorns the Buddha-field.

original: de bas na smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is the various kinds of vow.

original: sems can gyi dbang po ni dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang pos so //
analyzed: sems can gyi dbang po ni dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang pos so //
translated: The faculties of sentient beings are the faculties of faith, etc.

original: spyod pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa tha dad pas spyod pa tha dad pa dag go //
analyzed: spyod pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa tha dad pas spyod pa tha dad pa dag go //
translated: The conduct is the different kinds of conduct due to the differences in attachment, etc.

original: de dag la 'jug pa shes pa ni gang gis de dag la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de dag la 'jug pa shes pa ni gang gis de dag la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of their engagement is that by means of which one engages in them.

original: de'i bshad pa ni gdul ba'i sems can ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni gdul ba'i sems can ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Its explanation is the thorough knowledge of the sentient beings to be trained just as they are.

original: byang chub brgyan par byed pa'i chos gang dag yin pa de dag byang chub kyi rgyan te /
analyzed: byang chub brgyan par byed pa'i chos gang dag yin pa de dag byang chub kyi rgyan te /
translated: Those dharmas which are the ornament of enlightenment are the ornament of enlightenment.

original: de dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid rnams so //
analyzed: de dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid rnams so //
translated: They are the nature of the accumulations of merit and intuition.

original: de dag yang dag par thob par byed pa shes pa ni thabs gang gis rgyun du ste tshegs med par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de dag yang dag par thob par byed pa shes pa ni thabs gang gis rgyun du ste tshegs med par sgrub pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of their attainment is the means by which one accomplishes them continuously, without difficulty.

original: de yang thabs mkhas pa'i mdo'i tshul bzhin du rig par bya'o //üîΩde'i bshad pa ni tshogs rnam @94a * //
analyzed: de yang thabs mkhas pa'i mdo'i tshul bzhin du rig par bya'o // de'i bshad pa ni tshogs rnam @94a * //
translated: And that should be understood according to the method of the Skill in Means S≈´tra.

original: pa sna tshogs nye bar sgrub pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa sna tshogs nye bar sgrub pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Its explanation is: by the accomplishment of the various accumulations.

original: rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir lam du gyur pa ni rnam par dag pa'i lam ste shes rab bo //
analyzed: rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir lam du gyur pa ni rnam par dag pa'i lam ste shes rab bo //
translated: The path of purification is the path of wisdom, for the sake of purification.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa ni spang bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa ni spang bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pa'o //
